about_the_game:
In "Oh No, Orcs!", you take on the role of a brave archer defending your fortress from a dangerous horde of orcs determined to destroy the main gate. Strategically positioned at the top of a tower, your mission is to prevent the invaders from reaching the gate using your skills with a bow and arrow. But be careful: over time, the orcs become more organized and powerful, bringing with them improvements that will challenge your dexterity and endurance!

Gameplay: With each wave of attack, the orcs become more cunning and adaptable. At first, they are basic and simple shockers, but soon you will face orcs armed with sturdy shields, trained in combat tactics that deceive the player and even mounts that increase their speed. It will take a combination of skill and strategy to take down these forces before they can reach the gate.

Challenges: As the attacks intensify, the orcs will present improvements such as dodging arrows, shields and even beasts as mounts, making the defense of the gate even more complicated.

Resistance Under Pressure: With each passing minute, the level of pressure increases, and you must remain calm and agile to resist. Your ability to make quick and accurate choices will be crucial.

Battle Mood: Get ready for a true test of skills in "Oh No, Orcs!". Show your bravery, shoot with precision and defend your fort until the last second! Victory is within your reach, but will you be able to hold out until the end?
